/* Login.actionLogin : 사용자 로그인 처리 */
SELECT A.USER_ID ,A.LOGIN_ID ,A.PASSWD ,A.USER_NM ,A.USER_STTUS_CD ,A.CRTE_USER_ID ,A.CRTE_DTTM ,A.UPDT_USER_ID ,A.UPDT_DTTM ,B.AUTHOR_NM_KR ,C.IS_LOCK FROM CYL_CMM_0100_VN A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT AA.USER_ID ,AA.AUTHOR_ID ,BBB.AUTHOR_NM_KR ,RN FROM (SELECT AAA.* ,(CASE @vjob WHEN AAA.USER_ID THEN @rownum := @rownum + 1 ELSE @rownum := 1 END) RN ,(@vjob := AAA.USER_ID) vjob FROM CYL_CMM_0101_TN AAA JOIN (SELECT @vjob:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) R ORDER BY AAA.USER_ID ) AA INNER JOIN CYL_CMM_0200_TN BBB ON AA.AUTHOR_ID = BBB.AUTHOR_ID ) B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.RN = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CYL_KAIT_LOGIN_HIST C ON A.LOGIN_ID = C.USER_ID WHERE A.USER_STTUS_CD = 'p' AND A.LOGIN_ID = #{user_id} AND A.PASSWD = #{passwd}

/* Login.selectLoginHist : 사용자 테이블 조회 */ SELECT A.LOGIN_ID ,B.USER_ID as HIST_LOGIN_ID ,B.IS_LOCK ,B.FAIL_CNT FROM CYL_CMM_0100_TN A left outer join CYL_KAIT_LOGIN_HIST B on A.LOGIN_ID = B.USER_ID where A.LOGIN_ID = #{user_id};
